resources.string:
1. Click 'Take photo', then on the camera button to take a photo.
2. Click 'Add details', then give the problem a name (e.g. 'Broken street light'), and add your own name and email address. 
3. Wait for a GPS fix (it'll take longer if it's cloudy). Then, click the 'Report' button to upload the problem to Fix My Street. 
4. Check your email. You'll need to click on a link to confirm the problem and add a few more details.
